update zj_xm_jx_assessment_user_score set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and score_id in
#{model.scoreId}
mapper.insert:
insert into zj_xm_jx_assessment_user_score (score_id, assessment_id, auditee_key, auditee_name, auditee_id_number, auditee_position, auditee_rank_type, auditee_last_type, auditee_user_type, auditee_type, auditee_dept_id, auditee_dept_name, auditee_pro_id, auditee_pro_name, assessment_type, confirm_status, notified_time, score, principal_score, secretary_score, reviewer_position, reviewer_key, reviewer_name, audit_time, audit_status, deduct_reason, remarks, sort, del_flag, create_time, create_user, create_user_name, modify_time, modify_user, modify_user_name ) values
( #{item.scoreId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.assessmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditeeIdNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditeePosition,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeRankType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeLastType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeUserType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeDeptId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditeeProId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.auditeeProName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.assessmentType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.confirmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.notifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.principalScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.secretaryScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.reviewerPosition,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.reviewerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reviewerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.deductReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select
from zj_xm_jx_assessment_user_score where del_flag = '0'
and assessment_type = #{assessmentType,jdbcType=CHAR}
and notified_time is not null and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, notified_time, NOW()) > #{startValue,jdbcType=INTEGER} and audit_status != 4 and audit_time is null ORDER BY modify_time DESC

SELECT t1.auditee_pro_id as projectId, t1.auditee_pro_name as projectName, t1.auditee_key as userKey, t1.auditee_name as realName, t1.auditee_id_number as idNumber, t1.auditee_position as position, t1.auditee_rank_type as rankPositionType, t1.auditee_last_type as lastPositionType, t1.auditee_user_type as userType, t1.auditee_dept_id as deptId, t1.auditee_dept_name as deptName, t2.`year_month` as yearMonth, t1.assessment_id as assessmentId, MAX(CASE t1.assessment_type WHEN '0' THEN IFNULL(t1.score,0) ELSE 0 END ) as taskScore, MAX(CASE t1.assessment_type WHEN '1' THEN IFNULL(t1.score,0) ELSE 0 END ) as peripheryScore, MAX(CASE t1.assessment_type WHEN '2' THEN IFNULL(t1.score,0) ELSE 0 END ) as principalScore, MAX(CASE t1.assessment_type WHEN '3' THEN IFNULL(-t1.score,0) ELSE 0 END ) as compositeScore, MAX(CASE t1.assessment_type WHEN '4' THEN IFNULL(-t1.score,0) ELSE 0 END ) as systemScore FROM `zj_xm_jx_assessment_user_score` t1 LEFT JOIN zj_xm_jx_monthly_assessment t2 ON t1.assessment_id = t2.assessment_id WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.del_flag = '0'
and t1.assessment_id = = #{assessmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}
and date_format(t2.`year_month`, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{yearMonth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m')
GROUP BY t1.auditee_key, t1.assessment_id
